comments.body: Where do I get information on the project crowdfund and the state they are on the roadmap? According to the roadmap fund should have been raised now. what about token economics? NFTs purchase has massively decline but not absolutely stop due the market sentiment, how does the team plan to sustain the token trade?

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: The game looks unique, before there has been no game that took the concept of pirates entering it into the Play To Earn game, now crypto pirates is the first. I want to try it right away, but I can't find where I got the game application, I also don't open their website it seems hard to access for now.

comments.author: Innerpumper
comments.body: I believe this game is very unique because this is the first time we have seen a battle game with a pirate concept where the concept is taken from real pirates. I can't wait to try the game. But the game Play to earn is also of course expected to profit from playing. I hope their tokens remain stable even though they are always distributed to the players.

I can't wait to try the game. But the game Play to earn is also of course expected to profit from playing. I hope their tokens remain stable even though they are always distributed to the players.since this is another p2e gaming platform, do you have idea how much you need to spend in order to access the game? there are several free p2e gaming platforms already. however, their challenge is how to attract these gamers to play their game and buy their tokens. not all p2e gaming platforms will be successful so we will see how far crypto pirates can get their players and sustain them.

comments.author: the rise
comments.body: 👑NFTs and ship stats🏴‍☠️Crypto Pirates NFTs can improve the stats of a ship. At the moment, a player can have up to 10 NFTs installed on their account. ☄️There are eight stats in the game:1️⃣HP 2️⃣Defense3️⃣Attack 4️⃣Accuracy 5️⃣Maneuverability 6️⃣Speed   7️⃣Hold 8️⃣Inventory 🛡These stats affect a ship’s survivability, the speed of killing monsters and how far the ship can ultimately sail. The farther the ship sails, the more piastrs it can earn.⚔️NFTs affect stats depending on their grade.👀For details, see the 👉  https://medium.com/@Crypto-Pirates/the-role-of-nfts-in-the-crypto-pirates-metaverse-5811ae64c5eb🤩You can take the opportunity and buy NFT Box at the lowest price while MINT is going on. The invested money will not only quickly recoup, but will also begin to bring you profit in the shortest possible time!➖➖➖➖

comments.author: the rise
comments.body: 😏 And we continue to talk about our plans for the development of the game. Today we will talk about social activities:🫂Friend system and groupsPlayers will be able to add each other to their friends list. Actions available to friends:🔸 adding to the group for PvP and PvE battles🔸joint attacks of summoned bosses🔸one special adventure per day for a group of friends👆 the higher the level of the ship, the more friends you can add👯‍♀️And there will also be Squadrons (clans, guilds) and Alliances and separate events for them.⚔️ArenasIn addition to random PvP in swimming, players will be able to fight in arenas, receiving a rating for winning. For winning the regular ranked season, players will receive special rewards.➖➖➖➖

comments.author: the rise
comments.body: 🤘Hi, pirates! The open test is in full swing.🚀What you see is only the skeleton of the game, its prototype. There is still a lot of work ahead, because we have grandiose plans!💪👀 We will talk about some of them:👇like & retweets

comments.author: the rise
comments.body: 🙋‍♀️Ahoy, pirates! In this post we will tell you how else you can have fun in the world of Crypto Pirates. Let's see what we have in mind for you?🌚🤹QuestsIn harbors and ports, the player will be able to take on special tasks for which they will receive a reward:🔹Killing certain monsters and bosses🔹Exploring certain areas of space🔹Cargo shipping🔹Scouting system (attached to harbors and ports)🥷Headhunters Guild. For tokens, it will be possible to order a hunt on your offender, if you have a "reason" for this - you lost to them at least 1 time in PvP. More details later:pekapeka:🎣 And to diversify the gameplay and add game mechanics loved by many, we will add mini-games.🔥It's been a week since early access to the game started. Share your impressions with us and other players!🙌➖➖➖➖
